title: LF ADC duo
body:
Support main, currently Gold 3 looking for a friendly ADC duo.
A big emphasis on not being incredibly serious about league, please don't be super serious about the game.
IGN - Daghoon

replies.body:
Hello there :) This sounds like my cup of tea. 

Looking for a friendly person to who knows their stuff and enjoys a non-toxic atmosphere. 

I love playing adc/support so know the match-up fairly well, however I'm only level 29 and I'm looking to rank soon. Let me know if you'd be keen for a few games anyway - always looking for decent people to team up with :)

IGN: Fallowfield
